profiles.name: Chihiro
profiles.title: Community Manager
bio: The original founder of Nabepero Post Production Team, along with her college friend.
Lives in San Diego, California with a one-orange-braincell cat.
Passionate about contributing to people's success through video editing.

profiles.name: Kotone
profiles.title: Team Manager
bio: Rad manager of the editing team who has been living in the Philippines for over 5 years.
Exceptional at translating Japanese to English and vice versa.
Has 5 cats and is especially in love with her siamese cat named Roxy.

profiles.name: Mai
profiles.title: Lead Editor
bio: Our friendly lead editor with remarkable editing skills that we are proud of.
Advancing her skills in special effects for film and non-linear storytelling techniques.
Enjoys learning languages, shooting analogue film, and attending local film festivals that showcase the Filipino regional cinema.

profiles.name: Ryosei
profiles.title: Chief Editor
bio: Our Chief Editor who excels in After Effects and motion graphics.
Has been working on 3D animation projects recently.
In his free time, he is into CrossFit where he pushes himself to the limit.

profiles.name: Gley
profiles.title: Video Editor
bio: Newest member and fastest learner on the team!
Graphic Animation and Typography are 3 skills she is focusing on developing right now.
Her hobbies are reading romance, thriller and mystery novels, crocheting and pilates.

profiles.name: Nino
profiles.title: Video Editor
bio: Great at creative editing especially in the field of anime.
Enjoying expanding skills on cinematic editing and motion graphics currently.
Loves making and listening to music, baking, photography, and... anime!

profiles.name: Angelica
profiles.title: Video Editor
bio: All-round player with an output that always exceeds our expectations.
Developing a solid foundation in making contents like motion graphics and how to come up with a seamless storyboard for presentation.
Her hobbies include reading C-novels, K-novels, Japanese manga, and Korean webtoons.
